key.name: debugging-mode
key.summary: Enable or disable the debugging mode
key.description: Enable the debugging mode to see what happened, for debugging or issue reporting or development purpose

key.name: enable-close-by-rules
key.summary: Enable or disable the ability of closing windows by customed rules, such as a shortcut

key.name: windows-mapping
key.summary: The mapping of xid and stable sequence of a window on X11

key.name: close-windows-rules
key.summary: Rules that are used to close applications
key.description: Rules that are used to close applications

key.name: enable-autoclose-session
key.summary: Enable to close running apps and windows while Logout, Reboot and Shutdown via endSessionDialog.

key.name: enable-restore-previous-session
key.summary: Enable to Restore previous apps and windows at startup

key.name: enable-autorestore-sessions
key.summary: Enable to restore session(s) on startup
key.description: Enable to restore session(s) on startup and install `~/.config/autostart/_gnome-shell-extension-another-window-session-manager.desktop`.

key.name: restore-session-interval
key.description: Restore applications at intervals of some milliseconds, up to 5 minutes

key.name: restore-at-startup-without-asking
key.description: Restore immediately at startup without asking

key.name: autorestore-sessions-timer
key.summary: Set the timer on the AutostartDialog for some seconds
key.description: Set the timer on the AutostartDialog for some seconds, the upper value is 3600s

key.name: restore-previous-delay
key.summary: Start to restore the previous session after a specified delay
key.description: Start to restore the previous session after a specified delay, the upper value is 3600s

key.name: autostart-delay
key.description: A specified amount of time to delay to execute the target command.

key.name: raise-windows-together
key.description: Raise all two windows together while one of the pairs is raised while tiling.

key.name: stash-and-restore-states
key.description:
Stash states while Gnome Shell restarts via `Alt+F2 -> r` or `killall -3 gnome-shell`, and restore the windows states after the restart finishes.
Only enabled on X11, since Wayand doesn't support restart on fly.

key.name: recently-closed-number-to-keep
key.summary: The number of recently closed sessions to keep. Set to 0 to disable it.

key.name: window-width
key.summary: Set nautual width of the window of the popup menu
key.description: Set nautual width of the window of the popup menu. It's so annoy that the position of the button on the popup menu could be changed if the content length becomes longer or shorter.

key.name: tabs-position-on-popmenu
key.summary: Set the tabs position on the popup menu
